name: La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi South

reviews.text: This is a really average hotel and fine for our purposes. But we paid twice what we would normally pay for a hotel of similar quality, and that was really frustrating. Yes, I think this hotel had better decor than your average Econo lodge, but the mold on the shower ceiling still showed through (despite an attempt to glop paint on the top of it.) This kind of thing is not a big deal to me for one night, but it is kind of irritating considering the price. I really don't know why the price was so high--I thought it was because it was a Friday night in the summer, but checked on Friday night prices for July (that's next month!) and those rates were about half.
reviews.title: Not worth the money

reviews.text: First room we were given, the TV and the phone didn't work. Next room better. Nice room and very clean and comfortable. Only microwave didn't heat properly. We were on back side of hotel, so no highway noise. Had good place to park our small motorhome next door behind business that was closed. Price a little high, but it was Cinco de Mayo weekend, so lot of people in town. Demand allowed hotel to get higher price...we paid $108.68 including taxes.
reviews.title: Not too bad.
my stay at Laquinta
reviews.text: nice clean rooms and friendly staff great location near resturants, The pool was clean and well taken care of. I will be returning to this Laquinta and other locations. The breakfast was good your choice of bagels, muffins doughnuts and waffles

Decent breakfast with coffee, juice, cereals, fruit, waffles. Great price. Beds are lumpy & uncomfortable. Friendly staff. Easy on/off expressway. Older facility with outside doors with noise from outside. Only a fifteen minute drive to beach.
reviews.title: Spring Break

reviews.text: The front desk staff was very sweet. ..BUT.. it's like you gave an 80 year old a face lift & tried to make us think they're 35. New beds, new paint but the room has rusty door hinges & old carpet. Really La Quinta! !!!
reviews.title: Bad face lift!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I had a pleasant experience here. We enjoyed the hdmi connections on the tv which enabled us to watch movies from our computer on the tv. Also the tv had a mood setting which played a beach scene with background noise of waves crashing. My wife wanted me to add the bathroom was roomy with a nice counter top. The morning breakfast and free wifi was nice too.
reviews.title: Nice Overall Experience
Quality stay for a quality price
reviews.text: This La Quinta has a great location near malls, movie theaters, and plenty of resturants. The bedroom was clean, plenty of hot water in the shower, and comfortable beds! The continental breakfast was stocked very well and the waffle machines are DA BOMB! I would and will stay here again.

Pictures online are not accurate in reference to the the breakfast seating area. The coffee was clear. For a pet friendly hotel there was no grassy areas for pets to use restroom. On the access road. Still traumatized by the sounds of cars driving down the highway. The bath tub had hair balls even before we showered. Mold above the shower on ceiling. Shower is great for short people. Hope the tall occupants are flexible. Air condition not working properly. The one positive would be the friendly staff. Happy travels!!!!
reviews.title: Don't stay here!
Good budget friendly hotel
reviews.text: We spent one night here over Spring Break. The room (2 full sized beds) was spacious & clean. Beds were comfy. The TV had a good collection of channels & the free wifi worked great. There was a charging station on the desk. Bathroom was decent with good water pressure, but could have used more towel racks or hooks. Staff was friendly. Continental breakfast was decent. Very pet friendly in that they don't charge extra for pets, but you do have to walk a little to find a place for Fido to potty. Although located right off SPID, we found the hotel to be pretty quiet. Overall a very nice value.

Very satisfied with La Quinta stay. Had everything we needed after a long day at the beach. Clean rooms and bathrooms and beds as ways very comfortable and as always continental breakfast was a great start to ourselves our morning. I would recommend this hotel to anyone spending time in the area.
reviews.title: Visit to Corpus Christi
Best two nights I ever had in a hotel
reviews.text: I was very impressed with the professionalism and friendliness of the staff. The rooom was beautiful, clean, and very comfortable. I will definitely stay there the next time I am in Corpus Christi. This was my first time at La Quinta, but I must say, it was certainly better than places I have stayed that cost more. Very good bargain, and very friendly people.

We stay at this hotel 1-2 times a year while visiting family and have never had any problems. This time around from the 1st to 4th day we were sorely disappointed. Complimentary Breakfast served out of Room 105 due to tile work being done in lobby area. 3 tables crammed in to a hotel room says it all. Tile workers were in no hurry to finish the job. No housekeeping service on Thanksgiving day really threw us for a loop as eating in our room due to the breakfast room being too crowded left us with alot of trash in the trash can and some spilled coffee on one of the beds. Also we noticed small ant looking bugs in the room the day we arrived; mainly on the walls and bathroom area. They didn't bite the kids but it gives you the creeps when you get ready for bed and start to think they may be in your bed as well. Our last day (we leave really early in the morning) my husband checked with staff the night before to ensure there would be enough coffee to fill his thermos and mug. Go to checkout and are advised no coffee. Front desk advised they are under new management.
reviews.title: Disappointed
The Shabbiest
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at this motel because of its proximity to the cemetery which my wife's fathers remains were going to be interred. I was appalled at the condition of the motel. As we walked to our room we noticed how dingy the walls were and all the trash in the flower beds. On entering our room we noticed an odor which I can't describe. The room was well worn. The tub and commode was sectioned off in a very tiny area by a door. There was mildew around the soap holder and along the ceiling above the tub. and the corners of the floor was filthy. To dress you had to step out into the sink basin area which was opened to the bedroom. There was no refridgerator, microwave or coffe pot although there was coffee packets on the table. However the staff promptly brought a coffee pot when we contacted them. The morning breakfast was not at all enticing so we ate elsewhere. I would not recomend this motel to anyone. In all fairness I must say that La Quinta is by far my favorite place to stay when traveling and we have stayed in some exceptional La Quinta Inn's. There are newer La Quinta Inn's in Corpus Christi although they are not as convient for us but for sure I will not stay at this motel again.

Oeiginally booked because of low price. But was pleasantly surprised. Customer service was excellent both front desk and cleaning staff. Room was very comfortable and clean. Close to our fishing spots. Close to shopping and restaurants. Excellent weekend stay. Will stay there again.
reviews.title: Welcome surprise.

aka: La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi South Hotel
